hiveArticle.title: Why You should Blog for financial independence
hiveArticle.body:
Motivation Post

An $100,000 a year salary is only $274 a day.$274 a day is only $11/hr if you earn income at 24 hours per day. Then, we also have to take taxes into account (big chunk of money), which further dilute your income.

Most people work 8 hours per day and travel. So, how do you make money the other 16 hours? Simple. You need to create assets that generate income around the clock. There is nothing wrong with having a job to pay the bills and buy necessities, but a job rarely sets you up for financial independence. You need assets that pay you 24 hours a day, 365 days a year in this new sharing economy.

And that asset is your Blog. Keep Blogging :)
